org.red5.server.api
Interface Mapping

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultMapping
public interface Mapping

Use to Map between names and objects Provides mapping for:

  • context path --> scope handler
  • service name --> service object

Author:
The Red5 Project (red5@osflash.org), Luke Hubbard (luke@codegent.com)

Method Summary
 ScopeHandler mapContextPathToScopeHandler(java.lang.String contextPath)
          Maps between a contextPath and a scope handler object
 java.lang.Object mapServiceNameToService(java.lang.String serviceName)
          Maps between a service name and a service object
 

Method Detail

mapContextPathToScopeHandler

public ScopeHandler mapContextPathToScopeHandler(java.lang.String contextPath)
Maps between a contextPath and a scope handler object

Parameters:
contextPath - the name of the context path eg: /myapp/room
Returns:
scope handler object, or null if no handler was found

mapServiceNameToService

public java.lang.Object mapServiceNameToService(java.lang.String serviceName)
Maps between a service name and a service object

Parameters:
serviceName - the name of the service
Returns:
the service object, or null if no service was found
